name: The Yawn
overview: Place yourself in the Middle Ages. As a knight, you must render your king a valuable service. A mysterious adventure game with excellent graphics from the well-known computer artists X-AMPLE. A German language text adventure with graphics created by The Bytewriders: Sebastian Broghammer & Steve Kups as programmers, the X-AMPLE team: Thomas Heinrich, Michael Martin Detert & Frank Illgen and with music by Markus Schneider & Stefan Hartwig. This game was published in November 1990 in Golden Disk 64 #11 (1990).
